title: Bourgoin and Morris on Maroon culture - patterns

content.question: Which of the following best describes developments like those depicted in the sources?

choices.label: Maroons attacked interior states to gain captives for their armies.
Revolts by enslaved people were often led by maroons.
People living in maroon communities rarely faced the threat of capture by enslavers.
Maroon communities carried out planned wars to protect their collective freedom.

content.answer: Maroon communities carried out planned wars to protect their collective freedom.
